mapper.select: select dr.*, d.code as d_code, r.file_name as r_file_name, r.file_size as r_file_size, r.path as r_path, r.resource_type_id as r_restype_id from t_device_resource dr, t_device d, t_resource r where dr.device_id = d.id and dr.resource_id = r.id and dr.id = #{id};

select dr.*, d.code as d_code, r.file_name as r_file_name, r.file_size as r_file_size, r.path as r_path, r.resource_type_id as r_restype_id from t_device_resource dr, t_device d, t_resource r where dr.device_id = d.id and dr.resource_id = r.id and d.code = #{code} and dr.check_status = 'checked';

mapper.insert: insert into t_device_resource(id,customer_id, device_id, resource_id, publish_log, area, show_type, start_time, end_time, stay_time, des, create_time) values(uuid(), #{customerId}, #{deviceId}, #{resourceId}, #{publishLog}, #{area}, #{showType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{stayTime}, #{des}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update t_device_resource set device_id = #{deviceId}, resource_id = #{resourceId}, area = #{area}, show_type = #{showType}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, stay_time = #{stayTime}, des = #{des} where id = #{id}
